snippet: It will be remembered that Judge HARRIS, of the Supreme Court of this State, allowed a writ of error in the case of Carnel, who had been convicted of murder and was to have been hung with Stookey. His course was severely censured by several papers...
lead_paragraph: It will be remembered that Judge HARRIS, of the Supreme Court of this State, allowed a writ of error in the case of Carnel, who had been convicted of murder and was to have been hung with Stookey. His course was severely censured by several papers in this city.
abstract: decision upon his application for stay of execution
